messages.subject: Offlist email problems
messages.msgSnippet: ... If anyone has problems with people from this list hassling them through email offlist just email me and send me their emails a fetteroll@earthlink.net
messages.messageBody:
on 8/14/02 10:30 AM, lurningathome@... at lurningathome@... wrote:

> Yes Lindsey.... I agree..... Especially when people are going as far as to
> email you personally.

If anyone has problems with people from this list hassling them through
email offlist just email me and send me their emails a
fetteroll@...

Joyce
Unschooling-dotcom moderator

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2236Subject: go to your rooms
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/13/2002 12:03:23 AM Central Daylight Time, ... Yes Lindsey.... I agree..... Especially when people are going as far as to email you
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/13/2002 12:03:23 AM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:


> to everyone who has made any attack on another person in this group...
>
> NO TV for a WEEK

Yes Lindsey.... I agree..... Especially when people are going as far as to
email you personally. Sometimes people can have issues and be to petty about
things, but of course people have their days, but you know......things can
get out of hand. I just draw the line when it starts getting to people
personally emailing people and furthering the attacks....

Kim


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
